name: defalcation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of secretly taking money that is in your care or that belongs to an organization or business you work for: There are charges against them of defalcation and mismanagement. We referred earlier to the very high incidence of defalcations by sole practitioners.
More examplesFewer examplesThese defalcations have caused considerable loss and hardship for members of the public.The fund is designed to compensate people who suffer monetary loss due to defalcation. These clients have suffered a loss because of a defalcation by the broker.
